mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_b.product (title, `desc`, price, originalPrice, coverPicture, slidePictures, detailPictures, spec, stock, status, createTime, updateTime, categoryId) VALUES (#{title}, #{desc}, #{price}, #{originalPrice}, #{coverPicture}, #{slidePictures}, #{detailPictures}, #{spec}, #{stock}, #{status}, now(), NULL, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE db_b.product SET title = #{title}, `desc` = #{desc}, price = #{price}, originalPrice = #{originalPrice}, coverPicture = #{coverPicture}, slidePictures = #{slidePictures}, detailPictures = #{detailPictures}, spec = #{spec}, stock = #{stock}, status = #{status}, updateTime = now(), categoryId = #{categoryId} WHERE product.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_b.product ORDER BY id
